Based on your preferences, I would recommend "Black Hawk Down" (2001) as a great movie from this list.

The movie is directed by Scott Glanz and stars Tom Hardy, John Malkovich, Ben Kingsley, Gary Oldman, Emily Mortimer, Stephen McHale, Mark Rylance, Kevin McKinnon, Steve Pemberton, Peter Hunt, and Ben Wherry. The film is based on the real-life events of the Battle of Mogadishu in December 1993 during the United Nations intervention in Somalia.

The movie features a great cast including Tom Hardy, John Malkovich, Ben Kingsley, Gary Oldman, Emily Mortimer, Stephen McHale, Mark Rylance, Kevin McKinnon, Steve Pemberton, Peter Hunt, and Ben Wherry. The cast includes many of the most talented actors in Hollywood today.

The movie also features a great soundtrack including music by Hans Zimmer, Michael Crichton, John Forsythe, David Grimes, James Newton Howard, Alex Rose, and John Wiggins.

Overall, "Black Hawk Down" (2001) is an excellent film from this list. The movie is well-directed, acted superbly, and has a great soundtrack that perfectly complements the rest of the movie.
